entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 p.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.7Â°C

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming east 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing in the evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 60 gusting to 80 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
